GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
net: rds: don't hold sock lock when cancelling work from rds_tcp_reset_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit afe7053c390fe8ff27d0c2ceaece5625283044ba, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit ac3615e7f3cffe2a1a6b25172dfd09e138593d82. For more details please see the references link.
